item.description:
Annual Rock N Rib Fest Anheuser-Busch, Daniel Webster Highway Merrimack, NH 03054 Phone: 603-589-2333 June 22-24, 2007
This is a family event benefiting community agencies with professional ribbers from around the Northeast. Music, entertainment, children's activities, hot air balloon rides and much more.
N.H. State BBQ Championship


Saturday, 11 a.m.-11 p.m.;
Cost: $5.
Children under 8 are free

http://www.rotaryribf...

Carpool location:

We will meet at the Nashua Rest Area and welcome center at exit 6 in Nashua. Look for Robert.

Note: We are doing this event with the Middlesex County Make Friends Travel Group.
item.name: Rock'N Rib Fest, Anheuser-Busch
